channel.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
channel.description: Is there a way to be anonymous while watching videos ( for ex. youtube) I use Tails, I never tried Whonix, I think it's hard. In tails you can watch videos with low security settings, but is it safe ? How I can stay anonymous while watching videos in Tails? If that is not possible I will install Whonix.

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online

item.description:
I can confirm the resolution error consistently appears on my end.

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
nslookup youtube.com

Workarounds sometimes. Hacky.
This sometimes helps since DNS gets resolved by other Tor circuit and then Tor is caching it or at least marking for new resolv attempt or something. (Actually sounds like a bug in Tor.)

Read full topic
item.source: Stay anonymous while watching videos online

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi Movial

Using youtube-dl in Whonix-14 works for me.

For example:

youtube-dl <some_youtube_url>

Movial:

Temporary failure in name resolution

It could be a temporary networking issue. I would try again a little latter as it may resolve itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
Thanks Patrick, then I guess the issue is more about YouTube browsing habits that would build a unique profile over time based on interests, timestamps, etc.? As for fingerprinting my understanding is that Tor Browser reduces it to the maximum.

Read full topic

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Not a Whonix / Tails specific issue. It’s about browser fingerprinting. Documented here:

Whonix

Tor Browser

Using Tor Browser in Whonix. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update T...

Read full topic
item.source: Stay anonymous while watching videos online

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: onion_knight
item.description:
Why watching YouTube videos over Tor, in this case Whonix, would be non anonymous or raise privacy concerns? I don’t get what is the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Stay anonymous while watching videos online

item.title: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
You can download videos using youtube-dl.

sudo apt-get install youtube-dl

youtube-dl youtube-link

Then watch the videos using VLC.

That provides more privacy but security wise I doubt anyone can comment on that. It’s like asking which code is more easily exploited, the firefox or vlc video parsing code.

Read full topic
item.source: Stay anonymous while watching videos online
